title: head bream) with Parma ham and rosemary butter sauce
description: Try daurade as an alternative to cod  - it’s delicious on the barbecue in this simple recipe served with a rich rosemary sauce.
ingredients: 4 daurade (gilt-head bream) fillets, scaled and pin-boned (ask your fishmonger to do this for you)
2 red peppers, roasted, skinned, sliced into long strips
2 green peppers, roasted, skinned, sliced into long strips
½ bunch rosemary, leaves picked, chopped
